text: Zulima Farber (born 1944) is a Cuban-born American politician and lawyer. She was the Attorney General of New Jersey for a few months in 2006."Officials: New Jersey attorney general to resign - Special Prosecutor says Zulima Farber violated state ethics laws", WABC-TV, August 15, 2006. She was the first Latina to serve as Acting Governor of New Jersey. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Zulima V. Farber, New Jersey Attorney General capsule bio *Calls in Trenton for Ouster of Attorney General *Corzine tells Farber to resign *N.J. attorney general resigns after prosecutor cites ethics Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:New Jersey attorneys general Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Cuban politicians Category:People from Havana Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:People from Montclair, New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Zulima Farber
